description.narrative: Salaries and other staff costs, which contributes to Environmental Sustainability, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By end 2021, the country programme is effectively designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards to achieve the best results for children in Chad.

sector.narrative: CO/RO Supply - technical assistance and collaboration in supply chain, procurement of goods and services, and logistics

description.narrative: Other General Services other general services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2019, Programme Coordination performed at an optimal level despite the vacant HACT specialist position, through the backup support of the Social Policy, Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation team for this critical function. The 2019 Programme Budget Review decisions were implemented timely for the key posts under Coordination according to the implementation plan, and are expected to contribute to improvements in programme performance in 2020. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:08/02/2020
